item.description: This week, we'll be focusing on an all important aspect of character and scene development: status. Defining the status of one's own and one's fellow character plays a major role in determining the shape of a scene. The games we play will help develop this understanding, as well as our more general improvisational impulses. We'll begin our rehearsal, however, with some drills designed to build our cast's physical rapport, an ingredient of authentic scenework.

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Meeting 3: Who's above who?
